transcript.text: Hello, thanks for joining the interview today.
Could you introduce yourself and your recent experience with React?
Sure. I'm a full‑stack developer focusing on React and TypeScript on the frontend.
Recently I led a project building a chat interface with real‑time updates and accessibility in mind.
We used React Query for server state and Zustand for local UI state to keep things predictable.
On the backend, we exposed a FastAPI service for transcripts and analysis results.
I also implemented keyboard shortcuts and screen reader support for the player controls.
In terms of testing, I covered core components and a small e2e flow for upload to display.
We shipped a dark mode and responsive layout to handle mobile data collection interviews.
If I had more time, I'd add word‑level timestamps and an editing workflow for reviewers.
Overall the team reduced review time by 35% and increased accessibility compliance scores.
